attributes.action: Motion a vote of no confidence in the government due to public dissatisfaction
attributes.additional_details: Motion a vote of no confidence in the government
attributes.background: The public are dissatisfied in the current government due to the contempt it holds for its own standards such as the parties held during lockdown or the policies that do more harm to many people such as increasing National Insurance & the abysmal attempt to help with energy price increases.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
